I'm an archaeologist deeply involved in quantitative archaeology

I've developed two RShiny apps on the C14 radiocarbon dating: [EUROEVOL_R](https://neolithic.shinyapps.io/Euroevol_R/) and [NeoNet](https://neolithic.shinyapps.io/NeoNet/)

These applications are based on R and leaflet:
